alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Franklin; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 11:03PM EST until November 15 at 10:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations ranging from an inch over the higher terrain north of I-81, to nothing in the valleys of southern Franklin and Adams counties. * WHERE...Franklin, Perry, Cumberland and Adams Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 10 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
